title: Module 1 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of React basics

questions.question: What is React?
questions.explanation: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, not a framework.

questions.question: React was created by which company?
questions.explanation: React was created by Facebook (now Meta) and is maintained by them along with the community.

questions.question: React components must return a single parent element.
questions.explanation: React components must return a single parent element, though you can use React Fragments to avoid extra DOM nodes.
